marketplaces.name: staticaland-skills
marketplaces.description: A collection of skills and tools for Claude Code

files.README.md:
# Staticaland Skills

Skills for Claude Code.

## Install

```
/plugin marketplace add staticaland/skills
```

## Skills

| Skill                | What it does                                             |
| -------------------- | -------------------------------------------------------- |
| **writing-revision** | Revises text to be clear, scannable, and action-oriented |

## Development

Validate before committing:

```bash
claude plugin validate .
```

## License

MIT
